ing: 1 (12 ounce) bag cranberries, fresh or frozen
1 bunch green onions, cut into 3 inch lengths
des: "Tangy and sweet with a bit of a bite. Quick and easy, and always requested at gatherings."
ins: Combine cranberries, cilantro, green onions, jalapeno pepper, lime juice, sugar, and salt in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a medium blade. Chop to medium consistency. Refrigerate if not using immediately. Serve at room temperature.
